things are confusing lately, idk what to say its just things dont seem like they should be, i mean i hate being back to good 'ol drugged up matt, i mean i like them because they take the edge off and ppl seem to like me better when im on them (or i just cant tell since im fucked up, in which case samething)the freinds i chill with all the time dont seem as much freinds anymore, i mean there freinds sure and good ones in some aspects i can trust them with alot of things and they got my back and whatnot....but theyre dicks! freinds shouldnt be that way, idk i kinda ditched chris and george for this "other freind life" and i might be starting to regret it. i jus dont know..
theres been alot of shit happening lately thats making me feel like i used to a year or to ago..i dont wanna be that way again.. fuck that , but...such is life..and lifes a bitch.. =(

i love the days when u just dont care about anything.. when your teacher tells you your failing and all u do is say "fuck you mr.judd" or when you want to just avoid everyone and go to your heaven by sitting by yourself. the day where u think so much about how u fucked up. or the day where the girl u like is talking to u and u just want to say "FUCK IT...Leave me alone" and walk away...

so today was sucky and tommarow will be to


"you remember that day when you were perfect? the day where u smiled and lit the world or the day you cried and made the earth shake? you know that day where everytime i looked at you i could tell, that you are infinite for ever and after"

so i spent the whole weekend at my moms on saturday she had a party and i got trashed and hung with some 22 year old weird guy lol he talked about the difference between niggers and black people. ha ha


so dont u hate the feeling of when u feel like theres nothin u can do so u let the dice roll how they are and it turns out wrong and all u think is that u should have been able to do soemthing? yeah.


hmm so i dont really have much to talk about. what can i say im a boring person :\ whadya gonna do?

i cant sleep im thinking to much. theres to many things jus FLYING threw my little brain. everytime i think im done it branches into 30898739583 different thoughts .it sucks. i has only been like 3 days and i already miss amanda and adria lol and i miss lythande and jessica but i have a reason for that i havent hung with them in FO' EVER lol its sick.


im gonna go b4 this gets to long even tho noone reads it anyway :? lol question mark!!!!!

so as of late i dont like the way things are goin down things are changing and rapedly(((SPELLING???))) i hate it. lythande told me that if u just let things roll it will all turn out in the end...lets hope.



i really dont like going to skool anymore not because of the classes and teachers but i dont like being around alot of people i get in bad moods.

i wanna try to quit smoking weed ...HA likethat will happen ..but i want to dont get me wrong. i think the reason i like drugs and alchohol is because u escape all the drama and everyday activities. it gives me a reason to be myself. when im sober im to worried about things.i hate it.


well im off

so lythande made my day today! we had a very good conversation i was very happy lol.


we talked baout how its starting to become last year again. not all at once like last year but slowly but surley.



night night

2 words....




fuck you...



dont u hate stupid ppl and stupid feelings? GOD! i have been home all day and i finally remembered why im never home....

i want to leave but dont want to bother anyone with my presence. have u ever had that feeling? u know the feeling, the one where when ur with ppl u think they dont want u to be! everyone says they do but u just cant help thinking they do so u ask them to take u home but u dont go when the pull out u just walk around for hours just becuz u dont want to go home either. becuz they feel the same way.....it FUCKING sucks...



BYE</3

so i just got done playin WoW..amazing lol

dont you hate it when the one girl u like is an impossability ? and occasionaly u think u might be getting threw or noticed but you arnt. you know that girl where u are wiling to make a complete ass out of your self just to see her smile light the room? i do...


im goin to bed now i hate skool i wish i didnt have to go but I MUST lol need to pass...

so its been awhile since i last updated but i have been havin alot of fun hangin with the coolest kids in the world amanda,nick,joe and chris.

i saw lythande last night at adrias it was so awesome to see her outside of skool lol!


um so nothing reall eventful has been goin down just the same thing over and over...but dont get me wrong i love it.



i have nothing to really talk about so im just gonna leave it at this



<3333

i found a mic built into my labtop

GIRLS

Find a guy who calls you beautiful instead of hot...
...who calls you back when you hang up on him...
...who will stay awake just to watch you sleep.

Wait for the boy who kisses your forehead...
...who wants to show you off to the world when you are in your sweats...
...who holds your hand in front of his friends...
...who thinks you're just as pretty without makeup on.

Wait for the one who is constantly reminding you of how much he cares about you and how lucky he is to have you.

Wait for the one who turns to his friends and says, "...that's her."



GUYS


Find a girl who calls you babe or baby face instead of hott or sexy...
...who can't stand it when you hang up on her...
...who would sit there for hours looking into your eyes...

Wait for the one who doesn't care what you look like, but what's inside counts the most...
...who looks at you with the twinkle in her eyes and sometimes kisses you on the cheek instead of the lips...
...who wants to be with you in public...
...who makes you smile just by knowing she loves/likes you back.

Wait for the girl who is a constant reminder of your happiness and joy.

Wait for the girl who you give piggy back rides to in public and she still is in view of her friends, when she gets off and says to you: "you're THE ONE for me."

so i finished "the perks of being a wallflower" it was effing amazing.


have u ever had that feeling were u dont think u are good enough? they suck. i get the feeling that no matter what i do i dont deserve the freinds i have or the freinds i have lost! maybe thats why chris is no longer my freind really ... he relized that! i feel bad for jesse me and him are getting close wich is awesome. i mean i really used to hate him but now he is better. but as for like amanda, adria , neva and them they try to stay my freind when they really might not want to... i know its probaly not true but on days like today i just cant help but feel that way. i really should stop thinking its bad for me... i need to keep busy thats why im going to the library to find another book by the author of "perks of wallflower" i didnt want to write it all. i need to try and participate more because when i dont i feel alone.


its on days like today when the world kicks your ass and the girl u love steps on your heart that you feel.....infinite.

so i found this poem i thought it was good.!

" the darkness emurges
out of dying light
the dark comes so quick i lose my sight
i hear voices screaming
voices filled with anguish and agony
nothing but darkness, yet...
forever i fall
i take a breath
but it hurts
my body feels like its being torn to shreds
damn theese voices in my head
and all they say is...
forever you fall
this is my life now 
filled with pain and hopeing for death
just like the voices 
i can feel their breath ,yet....
forever i fall
i almost love this feeling
a feeling of torture
the voices are screaming
they say my time is up
as i take my last breath
she whispers...
i love you..."

"Did you ever look, did you ever see that one person,
and the subtle way that they do these things and it hurts so much?
So much like choking down the embers of a great blaze.
It's that moment when your eyes seem to spread aspersions
and to scream confessions at the insipid sky parting clouds.
You let this one person come down in the most perfect moment.
And it breaks my heart to know the only reason you are here now is
A reminder of what I'll never have
I'll never have... I'll never..."
